file_content.text: Still stuck here when I should be with you, in Section X.
Blasted medical droid.
Irregular heart rate. Mental trauma. Recommendation: regression therapy, bed rest.
Out of the question. I'm fine. Fit as a fiddle.
Denial. Increased distress.
Master Jedi! Please ignore the droid. Routine checkup.
Major! Well done with Rakton. Ignore the droid--it's defective.
Captain! Victor over the Voidwolf, right? Ignore the droid--someone needs a memory wipe.
Shut up. We have company. Just the help we need to clean up this mess.
Name's General Conlath. Used to command Republic forces on Belsavis. Then they moved me here, said I couldn't handle it anymore. Ha!
It's the Dread Masters' fault--Sith who terrorize entire armies with fear. Their forces descended on Belsavis, but they couldn't scare me!
They mustn't take Belsavis.
I've seen what the Dread Masters made Kephess do on Asation. We can't let them overrun Belsavis.
I saw the Dread Masters' power over Denova. We can't let them take an entire planet.
You know 'em. Maybe you can stop 'em, too.
The Republic fought hard to hold Belsavis. We can't let a few Sith sweep in and ruin everything.
Right as rain. And unlike me, you're free to do something about it.
There's no shame in admitting to terror. The pressures of this war have broken Jedi and soldiers alike.
You're clearly traumatized.
Nonsense. My brain fever was temporary. Brought on by spoiled rations.
The dark side can poison the mind with fear, but to cripple a whole army? The Dread Masters' strength must be amplified by working in unison.
What incredible power.
Maybe you can ask 'em in person. After routing their army, of course.
You're suffering from post traumatic stress. Follow the droid's orders. Get some rest.
You need to recover, sir.
Concern noted, Major. But generals don't fear war. We thrive on it.
There's a Dread Master right behind you!
Boo.
Run! Run for your lives!
Please do not antagonize the general.
Ha! I knew you were joking, Captain. Good one....
Who are these "Dread Masters"?
Dread Masters?
Six of the nastiest Sith you'll meet. Fear's their weapon. Turns seasoned veterans into whimpering babies, but not me.
The nightmare's brewing on Belsavis, at Section X. We locked the Dread Masters there before the Imps sprung 'em.
Now the Dread Masters' servants are loose in Section X, and I'm stuck here with this quack droid. If you don't stop their vile army, no one will.
Whatever the Dread Masters are up to, we'll stop them.
You can count on us.
Hear that, doc? Least something good came out of this posting.
What is "Section X"?
Section X?
Old Belsavis security block. Republic built it out to imprison our Sith friends.
The Dread Masters' army's swarming over Section X. Head to Belsavis, help our boys beat 'em down.
Major Endran will brief you. He's a good soldier, even if he did report me to the psych doctors.
General Conlath's working himself sick. Give him a sedative.
Sedate him, droid.
Don't you dare!
I won't stand for... well, that's something, all right....
Major Endran. On Belsavis, Section X. He'll fill you in....
Tell this droid to shove off.
